title: VCA CareClub , | VCA Animal Hospitals
description: VCA CareClub is a pet healthcare program that offers pet owners in , an affordable way to keep their dogs & cats healthy.
cleaned_text: Annual exams, rechecks and sick appointments are all included,1 along with the yearly preventive services your pet needs to support their best health. Unlike an insurance plan that waits for something to go wrong, CareClub offers personalized plans customized for your pet's needs and plenty of benefits for you—all for a convenient monthly membership fee. The more you keep up with services, the more you save!3 Plus, unlock additional discounts on your pet's must-haves at [vcaCareClubBenefits.com](https://vcahospitals.com/shop/promotions/careclub-exclusive-benefits). Wellness questions, toxic ingestion, upset belly—no matter what, stay connected with free 24/7 Live Chat and manage your CareClub membership details with the myVCA app. CareClub Memberships are preventive pet health care plans and not pet insurance. CareClub Membership covers only the selected health care services and products which are specifically identified in the applicable CareClub Membership agreement.
